name: weather-js
description: An MCP server written in JavaScript

scripts.build: npm run bundle && jco componentize bundled.js --wit wit --world-name weather-js --out weather-js_provider.wasm
scripts.build:types: npm run jco types wit -o types
scripts.clean: rm -rf weather-js_provider.wasm mcp-http-server.wasm .transport-tmp.wasm dist types bundled.js
